archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Environmental Health & Safety Monitoring and Compliance Management
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: HSE (Healty, Safety & Environmental) aspects of real estates, and equipment and services related to the real estates needs to be evaluated continuously to comply to applicable laws and relevant industry standards. To achieve a good HSE management there is a need for supporting applications to have knowledge about applicable laws and regulations, setting up policies and objectives with monitoring/followup up, and auditing and reviews.
